subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
Bryan Dongray wrote:

>> If I had the money, my property would have geothermal, wind and solar. 
>> I'd have so much power I'd be selling the excess back to grid.
> 
> Me too!
> 
> If I had a little river/stream, might be able to have a little
> hydro-electric too :-)

Cute!

As funny as that is, it's not totally out of the question.

Sign me up.
